INSERT INTO CrewBattle(battle_id, battle_name, battle_goal, battle_end_recruitment, battle_end_date, battle_content, battle_state, crew_id) VALUES(#{battle_id}, #{battle_name}, #{battle_goal}, #{battle_end_recruitment}, #{battle_end_date}, #{battle_content}, #{battle_state}, #{crew_id}) =======
